thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Altarea FY Revenue Up At 1.94 Billion Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Altarea FY Revenue Up At 1.94 Billion Euros
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Altarea Sca:
* FY REVENUE EUR 1.94 BILLION, UP 22.6 PERCENT VERSUS YEAR AGO‍​
* FY RECURRING NET INCOME EUR 256.3 MILLION, UP 33.5 PERCENT VERSUS YEAR AGO
* 2017 DIVIDEND AT EUR 12.50 PER SHARE * FY TOTAL OPERATING INCOME EUR 531.1 MILLION, UP 27.8 PERCENT VERSUS YEAR AGO
* BY 2020, AIMS TO GO BEYOND 10 PERCENT OF FRENCH ACCOMODATION MARKET SHARE‍​
* BY 2020, AIMS FOR FUNDS FROM OPERATIONS (FFO) IN THE ORDER OF EUR 300 MILLION
* BY 2020, AIMS FOR A LOAN-TO-VALUE RATIO AT ABOUT 40 PERCENT
* BY 2020, AIMS TO MAINTAIN A DIVIDEND POLICY IN LINE WITH THAT FROM PRECEDING YEARS Source text: bit.ly/2oRGFDF Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
